summary: Dr. Jennifer M. Liao voluntarily surrendered her medical license (D78756) to avoid further prosecution of disciplinary charges, including unprofessional conduct, professional incompetence, and habitual abuse of illicit substances. This action followed an initial summary suspension in February 2017 due to erratic behavior impacting patient care. The surrender, effective June 7, 2017, is treated by the Board as if the license were revoked.
